item.title: @SQLCardiff: Return of the Beard (2016-03-30)
item.description: Just a quick heads up to peeps in and around Cardiff, Wales. Later this month we’re holding Battle of the Beards: Return of the Beard. Fantastic speakers with resplendent beards are joining us for our 6 sq. ft of pizza to present on advanced SQL Tricks, using PowerBI as a DBA, and stepping up to the challenge of the last minute audit. This is a great chance to meet folks interested in the Microsoft Data Platform and learn from some incredibly knowledgable speakers.
